name: Gorgeous than EVIL-Stronger than CHRIST
description:
Gorgeous than EVIL-Stronger than CHRIST (ALBUM) 1-"111" 2-"Transex Jesus" 3-"Smash your Church" 4-"My World" 5-"Alone" 6-"Underdose" 7-"Love Vampire" 8-"Jah-bul-on" 9-"Alien" 10-"You know you're right" 11-"Fashion God (remix)" 12-"Maniac" 13-"Together we die for"
- 8 brand New Songs - 2 Cover feat NIRVANA & FLASHDANCE - 2 Unreleased Demo early records of Richard Christ (ALIEN / My World) - 1 Remix of Fashion God RICHARD:"Voice,rhythm guitar,trasformation to 82 khz,torture under skin ,spells and magic,love vampire & indigenous style" " EGON:"sexual bass violence,disgusting oral noise,extreme shapes,abortion of the lord, I just wanna fuck you " MARK:"Maniacal guitarist,spokesman of god hermit society,obsessive thinker,drugs & love make me feel alive " Produced by Richard Christ & Egon Lovecraft Released by SIAE All music & lyrics written, arranged and performed by Richard Christ / Egon Lovecraft / Mark Blaze Conceived during 2008-2009 by Richard-Egon-Blaze Recorded, Edited and mixed during 2008-2009 Mastered by Richard Christ @ Death Pop Studio, MC, Italy Graphic design by Carosello Lab Published By Narcotica.
